Ambrosia's three children are her reason and hope to improve, as they are studying in different colleges in nearby cities. Now she is thinking of increasing her monthly income. She will achieve this by investing in the purchase of livestock that she can take to pasture and raise, so that after some time, she can sell them in the various cities close to her home.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more livestock so she can sell them in other cities

loans.name: Artemia

texts.es:
Artemia vive con su esposo y sus  4 hijo jóvenes.  Hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza D. animales,  lo que le ayuda en la economía D. su hogar, para educar a sus hijos, por ello toma todo el día en esta actividad, gracias a que pueD. criar sus animales dentro D. su casa, no tiene dificultades en atender su hogar y su negocio al mismo tiempo.Lo que le agrada es ofertar sus chanchitos en los mercados, ver que le dan buenas ganancias e ingresos por ellos, con los que pueda solventar los gastos D. su familia, lo difícil es trasportar  estos animales a las ciudades, ya que los carros llegan a su zona solo cada mes o por quincenas.
Artemia tiene en sus cuatro hijos, las cuatro razones D. por qué seguir trabajando con sus animales. 
Desea invertir mayor cantidad D. dinero en la compra D. ganado, los cuales aumenten su venta D. carne en los mercados y así ser una prospera comerciante.
texts.en:
Artemia lives with her husband and four young children. She has been raising animals for four years, which helps the household financially, and allows her to educate her children. She spends all day working, and thanks to the fact that she can raise the animals insiD. her home, she does not have any difficulty taking care of her home and business at the same time. She likes to sell her piglets in the markets and see that she gets good earnings and income from them. With this money she can pay for household expenses. It is difficult to transport the animals to other cities, as cars come to her area only every month or two weeks. Artemia has four children at home, and they are her reason to keep working with the animals. She would like to invest more money in the purchase of livestock, which will increase her meat sales at the markets and allow her to be as prosperous vendor.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more livestock

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El Sr. Wilfredo tiene 31 años de edad, habita en el barrio Lomas del Memorial Sandino, es casado y tiene dos hermosos hijos, su esposa es ama de casa. El negocio de don Wilfredo es la venta de utensilios escolares entre otras variedades, son ocho años los que lleva en las ventas. El inició vendiendo cartera y llaveros,  con la solicitud del préstamo es para invertir en el negocio en la compra de útiles escolares, para mantener siempre la variedad que lo ha caracterizado. Sus planes son incrementar el volumen de ventas, y obtener nuevo segmento de mercado a través de la oferta de nuevos productos
texts.en:
Mr. Wilfredo is 31 years old and lives in the neighborhood of Sandino Memorial Hills with his wife and two beautiful children. Wilfredo has worked in sales for 8 years. At the beginning Wilfredo sold wallets and key chains, but over time he has expanded his business to the sale of school supplies and other variety items. Wilfredo is requesting this loan in order to purchase a greater quantity of school supplies, and thus continue to provide good variety to his customers. Wilfredo plans to increase his sales and gain a better foot hold within the market by offering new products.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of school supplies for retail sale.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for AFODENIC - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Sotero

texts.es:
El Sr. Sotero B. está construyendo su casa poco a poco nada más que le está haciendo falta un cuatro más para su hijo. Pero en esté momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario ya que su hijo entro a la escuela e hizo muchos gastos y no completa para comprar el material y empezar la construcción del cuarto.
El Sr. Sotero trabaja para una compañía en el puesto de cargador,  pero aparte de su trabajo el se dedica en las noches a vender hot-dogs para tener más ingreso en su familia y poderles dar una vida mejor.
El está solicitando un préstamo de $775.00 dlls a Kiva para la compra de material y empezar la  construcción de un cuarto más en su casa.
texts.en:
Mr. Sotero B. is building his house little by little and what he is missing is one more room for his son. But at this moment he does not have the money necessary as his son entered school and has a lot of expenses, so he does not have enough to buy the material and start the construction of the room.

Mr. Sotero works for a company as a porter, but besides this he works selling hot dogs at night to have more income and be able to give his family a better life.

He is requesting a loan of $775 from Kiva to buy the material and begin the construction of one more room in his house.


Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of a room on the ground floor of his house.

loans.name: Jussely

texts.es:
Jussely tiene 34 años, vive con su esposo y su hijo. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, que se dedica al cultivo de papa y maíz en sus terrenos de cultivo que se encuentran alejados de su hogar, son muchas horas de caminata hacia allá, desde que se casó empezó con esta actividad la que le toma casi todo el día.Sin duda, lo que le agrada de su trabajo es que puede compartir horas de trabajo con su pareja,  lo que lo hace dinámico y placentero. Pero lo que perjudica sus cultivos es el costo muy elevado de los abonos que requieren.
Jussely  tiene en su familia a su principal motivo para trabajar incansablemente.
Ahora, anhela invertir en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes, los cuales le ayuden a obtener  mejores productos y así seguir mejorando como agricultora.
texts.en:
Jussely is 34 years old and lives with her husband and son. She is a very hard-working woman and works growing potatoes and corn on her land that is many hours walk from her home. Ever since she got married, she has been doing this work, which takes her nearly all day. Nonetheless, she is grateful that through this work she can spend time working with her partner, which makes the work dynamic and agreeable. The detrimental thing about her crops is the high cost of the fertilizers that they need. Jussely's family is her principal reason for working tirelessly. Now she would like to invest in the purchase of organic and chemical fertilizers, which will help her grow better products, and thus keep improving as a farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy organic and chemical fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly tiene 43 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres últimos hijos de 18,12 y 8 años.
Se dedica a la producción de verduras, sus chacras se encuentran a un costado de su casa y la otra parte de ellas, en las afueras de su comunidad, a donde tiene que  trasladarse todas las mañanas después de  atender a sus hijos y esposo.Esta actividad la viene realizando por más de 20 años, espera seguir dedicándose a ello por mucho más tiempo, ya que le agrada. Cuando sus verduras están listas, las trasporta hacia las ciudades más cercanas, siendo complicado para ella el pago del flete (a los camiones) por el traslado de sus productos.
Nelly lucha por el bienestar de su familia, esto la motiva en poder  trabajar cada día más.
Invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de abonos, con lo que espera mejorar sus productos y con ellos se eleve el costo de estos para sí, y en un futuro cercano poder adquirir su propia movilidad para trasportar sus verduras a las diversas ciudades.
texts.en:
Nelly is 43 years old and lives with her husband and the last three of her children, who are 18, 12 and 8 years old.

She raises vegetables. Her fields are located beside her house and another part of the fields are on the outskirts of her community, where she goes every morning after attending to her children and husband. She has been doing this work for more than 20 years, and hopes to continue for many more because she likes it. When her vegetables are ready, she transports them to nearby cities; what is complicated for her is paying for trucking to transport the products.

Nelly struggles for the well-being of her family, this motivates her to work harder every day.

She will invest the money she is requesting in the purchase of fertilizers, with which she hopes to improve her products and to be able to charge more for them. In the near future she would like to buy her own transportation to take her vegetables to various cities.


Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fertilizers to improve the quality of her vegetables and be able to charge more for them.

loans.name: Eleodoro

texts.es:
Eleodoro tiene 45 años, vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos de 18,12, 9 y 6 años, los cuales son estudiantes. Se dedica a la crianza de animales, sus carneros son los que mayor rentabilidad le proporcionan, dicha actividad la viene realizando hace 30 años y desde entonces, sale desde muy temprano por la mañana a los diversos pastorales del lugar para alimentar a su ganado  y llevarlos a los ríos o lagunas cercanas para que puedan beber el agua necesaria. Esta actividad le toma todo el día, hasta el atardecer, regresa muy cansado por el implacable sol del día y el terrible frío de la tarde.Pero le agrada su trabajo, sabe que tiene que alimentar y cuidar muy bien a sus animales, lo complicado es transportar la carne que obtiene hacia los mercados más cercanos.
Eleodoro tiene en su hogar el mejor motivador que todo padre y esposo pueda tener para  salir adelante, su esposa y sus hijos.
Él desea invertir en la compra de dos carneros de raza, para el incremento de su ganado, con ello, incrementará la cantidad de carne que llevará a los mercados para vender.
texts.en:
Eleodoro is 45 years old; he lives with his wife and four children who are 18, 12, 9 and 6 years old and are students. He raises animals, his sheep are what are the most profitable. He has been doing this activity for 30 years and since that time, early every morning he goes to the various grazing fields where he lives to feed his stock and takes them to rivers or nearby lagoons so they can drink water. This takes him all day to do, until sunset, and he returns home tired from the constant daytime sun and the terrible cold during the afternoon. But he likes his work. He knows he must feed and care for his animals very well. What is complicated is transporting their meat to the nearby markets.

Eleodoro's home, his wife and his children are the greatest inspiration he has a father to get ahead.

He would like to invest in the purchase of two rams, so he can increase his stock and increase the quantity of meat that he takes to market to sell.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy two rams to improve the quality and quantity of his herd.

loans.name: Clever

texts.es:
Cléver tiene 29 años, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 11, 8 y 2 años. Desde niño se dedicó a la ganadería, ya que desde pequeño le ayudó a sus padres en la crianza de sus animales en las zonas altas de su comunidad, ahora que está casado, ejerce íntegramente su labor como ganadero, lo que realiza todas las mañanas saliendo de su casa para pastear a sus animales y alimentarlos.Sin duda, le agrada su actividad, porque desde niño le gustaron los animales, criarlos es lo que más le apasiona, aunque lo difícil es velar por su salud, las enfermedades que les dan por el frío pueden ser fatales, por ello debe vacunarlos. 
Cléver tiene en sus pequeños hijos su mayor impulso del día a día.
Desea invertir el dinero del préstamo en la compra de medicinas para sus animalitos, así evitar la muerte, y con el tiempo, aumentar su ganado en vez que tengan que disminuir a causa de las heladas.
texts.en:
Cléver is 29 years old, he lives with his wife and his three chidren who are 11, 8 and 2 years old. Since he was a boy he has worked at livestock farming, when he was small he helped his parents raise animals in the mountains of his community. Now that he is married, he works full-time as a farmer. Every morning he leaves home to graze his animals and feed them. Without a doubt, he likes his work because he has loved animals since he was a child. Raising them is his passion, although what is difficult is looking out for their health, illnesses caused by the cold can be fatal and he needs to vaccinate them.

Cléver´s his greatest inspiration every day is his children.

He would like to invest his loan in buying medicines for his animals to avoid their becoming sick and dying. In time, he would like to increase his stock instead of seeing it decrease because of the freezing weather.


Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy vaccines for his animals in order to avoid their becoming sick and dying due to freezing weather.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha tiene 34 años, vive con su hijo de 12 años. Desde que empezó a trabajar como secretaria en el Terminal de Transporte de su ciudad, inició la venta de miel y de pisco, ya que es muy rentable y no descuida su trabajo, ya que en su misma agencia aprovecha en vender estos  productos.Lo que le agrada, es que las personas ya la reconocen y tiene clientes quienes le solicitan  varios pedidos de miel para llevarlos a sus ciudades, pero lo difícil es atender a sus clientes y al mismo tiempo a los pasajeros de la agencia, ya que si desea vender tiene que ser muy hábil en hacerlo para no incomodar a unos, ni dejar de atender a los otros.
Martha tiene en su hijo, su mayor motivo de  trabajo y esfuerzo, ya que es el único con quien comparte sus penas y alegrías.
Ahora, tiene pensado incrementar sus productos y tener mayor venta, con el tiempo poner un puesto de miel y pisco en el Terminal de Trasnportes, donde trabaja.
texts.en:
Martha is 34 years old and lives with her 12-year-old son. Ever since she started working as a secretary in the bus station in her city she began selling honey and pisco, which is very profitable and doesn´t cause her neglect her job since she sells these products from her same office. What she likes is that people now recognize her and she has customers who place orders for honey which they take to their own cities. What is difficult is taking care of her customers and at the same time the agency´s passengers. If she wants to sell she has to be very careful to do it in a way which doesn´t make any customers uncomfortable or causes her not to attend others.

In her son, Martha has her greatest motivation for working hard, as he is the only person with whom she shares her sorrows and her joys.

She is now thinking about increasing her products so she can have more sales. In time, she will set up a stand for honey and pisco at the bus terminal where she works.


Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase quantities of the products she sells, honey and bottles of Peruvian pisco.

loans.name: Mari Luz

texts.es:
Mari Luz tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 5 y 3 años. Tiene que esforzarse a realiza sobre cargada labor como madre y como agricultora, para ello tiene que preparar los alimentos desde muy de mañana, para luego salir rumbo a sus terrenos de cultivo junto a su familia, en la chacra trabaja hasta altas horas en la tarde, retorna a su hogar muy cansada.Lo que sin lugar a duda le agrada, es que el trabajo junto a su familia, esto lo hace menos cansado y agotador, aunque hay días que por circunstancias del tiempo y clima tiene que lidiar con ello y realizar su trabajo con mayor rapidez.
Mari tiene un gran amor por sus pequeños, y son ellos los que la motivan día tras día a seguir esforzándose.
Ahora está pensando en invertir dinero en la compra de semillas, para ello, de la misma forma, tendrá que adquirir abonos para la siembra, espera que con el tiempo, se consolide su labor y tener la capacidad de producir en mayores cantidades.
texts.en:
Mari Luz is 32 years old, she lives with her husband and two children who are 5 and 3. She tries very hard handle her heavy workload as a mother and as a farmer. To do this, she fixes meals early in the morning and later leaves for her fields with her family. She works on the farm until late in the afternoon and returns very tired to her home. Without a doubt, what she likes is working alongside her family, which makes it less tiring and exhausting. Although some days because of time and the weather she struggles to work faster.

Mari loves her little ones very much, and they are her motivation to keep working hard day after day. She is now thinking about investing money to buy seeds, and she will also have to buy fertilizer for the sowing season. She hopes that in time she will consolidate her work and will have the capacity to produce in greater quantities.


Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy seeds and fertilizer in order to increase and improve production.

loans.name: Sergio J. Dolores

texts.es:
El Sr. Sergio está reparando su casa pero por el momento no cuanta con el dinero necesario para comprar el materia para arreglar lo losa de su casa ya que está muy maltratada el quiere tenerla lista para antes de que se llegue la temporada de lluvias.

El tiene dos hijo que están estudian teme que lo mal que está la casa les afecté en su salud a sus hijos y tengan que estar faltando a la escuela.

El SR. Sergio está solicitando un préstamo a Kiva de $300.00 dlls para la compra de material ya que el se dedica a la albañilería (Construcción y reparaciones de casas) y el realizará los acabados en la losa de su casa.
texts.en:
Sergio is repairing his house but at the moment he does not have the money necessary to buy the material to fix the home’s foundation. It already is very damaged he wants to have it ready before the rainy season arrives.

He has two children who are in school. He fears that the bad condition that his house is in will affect his children’s health and that they will have to miss school.

Sergio is requesting a loan of $300 from Kiva to purchase the material. As he already works in bricklaying (Construction and home repair) he will carry out the finishing touches of his house’s foundation.


Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To finish the inside of the foundation

loans.name: Silvino

texts.es:
Silvino tiene 33 años, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 9 y 6 años. 
Es ganadero, desde pequeño aprendió a pastear a los animales y sobre todo cuidarlos, ahora de casado está pendiente de que su actividad como ganadero sea la mejor, ahora trata de invertir el mayor tiempo posible en su ganado, por ello, trata de bañar y vacunar a sus animales,  lo cual es muy tedioso, porque solo hay un lugar donde bañar a los carneros y no es fácil llegar, pero sin duda, el resultado le agrada, poder ver a sus animales limpios y sanos es una gran satisfacción.
Silvino tiene en su familia, su mayor motivador de progreso en su actividad como agricultor.
Con el dinero que solicita tiene pensado invertir en la compra de ganado de raza para mejorar la calidad de sus animales, lo que generará el incremento de sus ingresos y con ello la mejora en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Silvino is 33 and lives with his wife and 2 children, who are 9 and 6.

He is a livestock farmer, which he has done since he was young when he learned to graze and care for animals. Now he is married and is devoted to making his work the best that he can. He tries to invest as much time as possible in his livestock. He tries to bathe and vaccinate his animals, which is very tedious, because there is only one place to bathe the rams and it's not easy to reach. But without a doubt, the results please him: to be able to see clean and healthy animals is a big source of satisfaction.

Silvino's family is his main source of motivation and progress in his activity as a farmer. He plans to invest the money that he is requesting in the purchase of a good breed of livestock to improve the quality of his animals. He will then generate more income, and with it, improve his quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a good breed of livestock to improve the quality and selling price of his animals

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos estudiantes.  Desde muy pequeña se dedica a criar diversos animales, ya que desde muy niña, esa fue la forma de ganarse la vida en su familia, lo que aprendió es ahora su mayor actividad dentro de su hogar, nos comentó que lo difícil de criar a los cuyes es realizar constantemente una selección, y estar pendientes de sus alimentos porque son muy delicados, pero esto no limita su amor y cariño por estos animales, a los cuales después de un tiempo, los vende en los mercados de las ciudades a donde los lleva con mucha dificultad.
Catalina desea lograr el bienestar de su familia, por eso trabaja arduamente por conseguirlo.
El dinero que solicita desea invertirlo en la compra de cuyes de raza, de la misma forma carnerito, para poder criarlo y así, poco a poco llegar a ser una gran ganadera.
texts.en:
Catalina is 42 and lives with her husband and her 5 children, who are in school. Since she was very young, she has raised different animals. This is how her family earned a living. She uses what she learned to earn the main source of income for her home. She told us that the hard part about raising guinea pigs is constantly having a good selection of them and paying attention to their food because they are very delicate. But this doesn't limit her love and care for these animals, which she sells after a time in the city markets where she takes them with much difficulty.

Catalina hopes to achieve well-being for her family, but she must work very hard to achieve it. She hopes to invest the money that she is requesting into purchasing a good breed of guinea pigs and also a ram to raise so she can gradually become a big livestock farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the quantity and quality of her guinea pigs and to purchase a ram

loans.name: J Socorro

texts.es:
El Sr. Socorro tiene ya algunos años construyendo su casa ya casi la tiene terminada nada más le está haciendo falta los acabados del exterior de la vivienda y el piso de concreto en el patio.
El Sr.  es empleado de una compañías aquí en Nuevo Laredo su puesto es de mensajero (Su trabajo es entregar documentación a otras compañía aquí en la ciudad);este es su ingreso familiar. Tiene dos hijos los cuales están estudiando.

El Sr. Socorro P. a tenido ya 2 créditos de construcción con FVP los cuales los pago puntualmente es un cliente muy responsable en sus pagos.

Le está solicitando un tercer crédito por medio de  Kiva para comprar el material y tener su casa terminada completamente. El esta solicita un préstamo de $975.00.dlls.
texts.en:
Señor Socorro has been building his house for a few years now, and he almost has it finished. He only needs to finish the outside and the concrete floor of the patio.

Señor Socorro works at a company here in Nuevo Laredo as a messenger (he delivers documentation to other companies here in the city). His family's income comes from his job. He has two children, who are in school.

Señor Socorro P. has already had two credits with FVP, which he paid back on time. He is a very responsible client with his payments.

He is requesting a third credit from Kiva to purchase construction material and to finish his house completely. The loan amount is $975.


Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To finish the outside of his house and the floor of his patio

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz tiene 31 años, es separada, vive con sus dos hijos de 12 y 3 años.
Se dedica a la venta de DVDs y CDs, lo que realiza en su pequeña bodega, donde también vende dulces y bebidas, esta actividad la realiza desde hace tres años, nos dice que gracias a Dios su trabajo y su hogar esta en el mismo lugar y puede estar al pendiente de las necesidades de sus hijos.Lo que más le agrada es que puede  escuchar las últimas canciones de grupos nuevos y ver las películas que le gusten. Pero lo que a veces perjudica su negocio es que las personas comerciantes al por mayor la engañen, vendiéndole los discos en blanco, por eso es que está aprendiendo hacer muy cautelosa en ello. Luz tiene en sus dos amores, sus hijos, sus mejores motivadores de esfuerzo y trabajo.
Ahora desea adquirir un local propio, donde pueda vender sus películas y CDs obteniendo mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Luz is 31; is separated; and lives with her two children, who are 12 and 3.

She makes a living by selling DVDs and CDs, which she does in her small store, where she also sells sweets and drinks. She has done this for 3 years. She tells us that thanks to God, her work and her home are in the same place, and she can still be devoted to her children's needs. What most pleases her is that she can listen to the latest songs from new groups and watch movies that she likes. But at times what harms her business are the wholesale salespeople who deceive her and sell her blank discs. This is why she is learning to be very cautious with them. Luz has in her two loves, her children, her best motivators of strength and hard work. Now she hopes to acquire her own location where she can sell movies and CDs and obtain better profits.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase her own location where she will sell CDs and DVDs

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es:
Cirilo tiene 58 años, vive junto a su esposa, tiene 4  hijos, pero todos ellos ya son independientes. 
Dedicado a la venta de dulces (postres) de manera ambulatoria desde hace 4 años, actividad que le ayuda a solventar los gastos dentro de su hogar, aunque el trabajo le toma todo el día y varias horas de caminata por las calles, don Cirilo se siente muy contento porque las personas ya lo conocen y saben que donde  él esté podrán comprar los deliciosos dulces que prepara.Sin embargo, lo difícil es lidiar con el calor del sol, pero esto no limita.
Cirilo tiene en su esposa su mejor formula de motivación y de progreso. 
Con el dinero que solicita tiene pensado abrir un puesto de dulces donde pueda atender su esposa y él continuar con la venta ambulatoria, ya que está convencido que así gana mucho más dinero.
texts.en:
Cirilo is 58 and lives with his wife. He has 4 children, but they are all already adults. He has sold desserts as a street vendor for 4 years. This activity helps him pay for his home's expenses. Even though his work takes him all day and he has to walk through the streets for several hours, Cirilo is very happy because people know him and know where he will be so they can buy the delicious desserts that he makes. However, what's difficult is dealing with the heat of the sun, but this doesn't stop him.

Cirilo's wife is his main source of motivation and progress. With the money he is requesting, he is planning to open a dessert stand that his wife can attend to, and he will continue working as a street vendor. He is convinced that they will gain much more money this way.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To open a dessert stand that his wife will attend to.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene tiene 34 años, vive con su pareja y con sus dos hijos de 17 y 16 años. Es agricultura, desde muy joven se dedica a la siembra de gladiolos, hermosas flores que con el lapso de  6 meses pueden ser extraídas, sus terrenos se encuentran en una zona cercanas a su hogar, lo que le permite tener cuidado de sus cultivos y de su familia. Le agrada de su trabajo el ver florecer sus gladiolos, pero para sembrarlas requiere de  bastante dinero, sobre todo en la compra de semillas.
Para Marlene su mejor motivador son sus hijos jóvenes, quienes tienen muchos deseos de superación.
Con el dinero del préstamo desea incrementar sus cultivos de gladiolos, además de iniciar la siembra de maíz y papa por esta temporada.
texts.en:
Marlene is 34 years old. She lives with her partner and their two children aged 17 and 16 years old. Since she was very young she dedicated her time to cultivating gladiolas, beautiful flowers that after only 6 months olds can be transplated. Her land is located in region close to her home and it permits her to care of her harvest as well as her family. She loves her work, to see her gladiolas flowering. But planting a new harvest requires a great deal of money, especially in the purchase of seeds.

For Marlene her greatest source of motivation is her two young children, both of whom have great dreams of self-improvement.

With the funds from this loan, she wishes to increase her harvest of gladiolas, and she always wants to start a corn and potato plantation for this season.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To invest in her fields of harvest to plant gladiolas and start producing potatoes and corn.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
Ofelia tiene 38 años, vive con su pareja y sus dos hijos mayores. Está dedicada a la agricultura, sobre todo al cultivo de gladiolos que es lo más rentable, y lo que más demanda tiene en los mercados de su ciudad, el problema es que sus terrenos se encuentran en zonas lejanas, entonces tiene que levantarse muy de mañana para preparar los alimentos y luego llevarlos para que pueda comer junto a su esposo en su chacra, porque  dicha actividad le toma gran parte del día, teniendo así, que regresar a su casa al atardecer.Lo que le agrada, es que cuando los gladiolo florecen son muy hermosos y dan un magnifico paisaje al lugar, pero lo difícil es la extracción, debe ser con sumo cuidado y el trasladarlo a los mercados para su venta, aun más.
Ofelia tiene en su pareja su mayor motor de amor y de trabajo.
Ahora, desea comprar mayor cantidad de semillas de flores para incrementar sus ingresos  y con el tiempo abastecer a las florerías, y sobre todo, a los puestos que están en los cementerios.
texts.en:
Ofelia is 38 years old; she leaves with her couple and two of her oldest children. She works farming gladiolus which are very profitable, and in high demand on near by markets, the problem is that her farming land is located very far away, so she has to wake up very early in the morning to prepare food and then take it to his husband at work, so they can eat together, and this takes most of her day, so she gets back home at dust. She likes when the gladiolus are in bloom, because they are beautiful and provide a fantastic view, but harvest is difficult, as it has to be done very carefully and transportation to sales places even more. Now she wants to buy more seeds to increase her income and with time to supply also to flower shops and shops near by the cemetery.

Translated from Spanish by Nina Delgado, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the quantity of flower seeds for her farm

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 30 años y vive  con sus padres. Para lograr su independencia económica tuvo que dedicarse a la agricultura, hace 10 años  logró independizarse y aunque sigue viviendo con sus padres, ya no es una carga, sino es una ayuda para ellos.Es así, que dedica su tiempo a sus cultivos de fruta cítrica durante todo el día, tratando de cuidarlos y abonarlos adecuadamente, sobre todo, en la cosecha, que es lo que más le agrada de su actividad, pero también hay aspectos desfavorables, por ejemplo, la disminución del costo de sus productos en los productos. 
Héctor tiene en sus padres y sus proyecciones a futuro, como sus mayores motivadores en su vida. Desea el dinero para compra plantas de  cítricos y de café, que son lo más rentable y con precios estables, sobre todo el café, y con el tiempo, poder adquirir sus bienes con su propio esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Hector is 30 years old and lives with his parents. To get his economic independence he works in agriculture, 10 years ago he got his independence and although he is still leaving with his parents, he is no longer a dependent, instead he helps them. He works farming citric fruits all day, trying to take care of them and fertilize them, mainly during harvest, which is what he loves the most, but there are also unfavorable issues, like the decrease on the price of his products. Hector’s main motivations are his parents and his future projects. He wants money to buy citric plants and coffee, that are more profitable and have more stable prices, mostly coffee, and with time, be able to acquire wealth with his own effort.

Translated from Spanish by Nina Delgado, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy citric plants and coffee to increase production

loans.name: Alcida

texts.es:
Alcida tiene 51 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 23 y 16 años, además cuida a su madre, que vive junto a ellos.
Desde hace 6 años está dedicada a su tienda de abarrotes y a su tallercito de costura, los que se encuentran en su casa y le costó mucho esfuerzo instalarlos. Gracias a estas actividades puede estar junto a su familia y sobre todo cuidar a su madre anciana, quien requiere muchas atenciones.A Alcida le agrada dedicarse a la venta de productos y sobre todo a la costura, ya que le gusta la confección de prendas, le es muy fácil todo entablar conversaciones con sus vecinos y clientes, y así ampliar sus redes sociales, pero ahora  tiene ciertas dificultades para atender las necesidades de sus clientes, ya que su máquina de coser tiene desperfectos, y el alza de los productos perjudica su negocio.
Alcida tiene en su familia su mayor motivación, pero sobre todo en su madre a quien ama mucho.
Desea invertir en la compra de una nueva máquina de coser, además de  ampliar su negocio de venta de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Alcida is 51 years old and lives with her husband, her two children, and her mother. Alcida’s children are 23 and 16 years old. Alcida has been managing both a grocery store and a sewing workshop for the past six years. Both of her businesses are run out of her home, and she invested a significant amount of effort in installing them. Thanks to her businesses, Alcida can earn income while staying close to her family and caring for her elderly mother, who requires a lot of attention. Alcida’s motivation is her family, and especially her mother, who she loves dearly. She is happy to spend her time selling groceries and sewing, because she loves creating garments. It’s easy for her to strike up conversations with her neighbors and clients, and thereby expand her social network. However, Alcida is now having some difficulty because her sewing machine isn't working well, and a rise in prices is hurting her business. She would like to invest in a new sewing machine, as well as expand her grocery store.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Bishop, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a new sewing machine and expand her grocery store.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment

loans.name: Martha Petrona

texts.es: La señora M. L., tiene 40 años de edad es casada, tiene una hija de 4 años de edad, cursa el primer grado de primaria, su esposo, es ayudante de mecanica industral, donde habita alquilan, la actividad eocnomica de la señora es la venta de ropa, cosmeticos, y calzado masaya, actividad que tiene 10 años de desarrollar, su mayor sueño es poder ver a su hija realizada profesionalmente, sus sueño es poder adquirir una casa y su proposito es poder instalar una pequeña tienda de esta manera ofertar a sus clientes, y cuidar a su familia, la señora compra en managua, su sistema de venta es al credito y contado, su negocio surge como una alternativa al desempleo, asi mismo poder darle a su familia un poco mas de estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Mrs. M. L. is 40 years old. She is married and has a four-year-old daughter, who is in first grade. Her husband is an assistant to an industrial mechanic. They rent their residence. Mrs. M. L. sells clothes, cosmetics and Masayan footwear; she has been pursuing this for 10 years. Her major dream is to be able to see her daughter become a professional. She would also like to buy a house, so that she can install a small store and, in this way, take care of her clients and her family. Mrs. M. L. shops in Managua, where she can pay with either credit or cash. Her business is an alternative to unemployment. Also, she wants to give her family a little more economic stability.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Capital for her work

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación Leon 2000 - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 42 años, vive con su segundo esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 y 9 años.
Desde que se separó de su primera pareja tuvo que hacerse cargo del hogar, gracias a la agricultura pudo educar a su hijo mayor, ahora en su segundo compromiso sigue trabajando, pero criando animales, a los cuales quiere mucho, ya que aprendió la cría y a cuidar de ellos, aunque esta actividad demanda muchas horas de trabajo para pastear a sus animales, lo hace con agrado, lo difícil es en los  tiempo de lluvia, salir a pastear se hace muy complicado.
Juana tiene como motor de su trabajo, a sus tres hijos, aunque su primer hijo se encuentre lejos, ella no deja de velar por su bienestar.
Ahora, desea mejorar la raza de sus animalitos, para ello tiene pensado adquirir ovejas de raza, y así, con el tiempo, poder ser una gran ganadera.
texts.en:
Juana is 42 years old; she lives with her second husband and her 12 and 9 year old children. After her divorce, she took care of her family all by herself, and she was able to send one son to school with the funds from her work in the fields. Juana now works raising cattle, a job which she loves even though on rainy days, she says, feeding the animals becomes a very tough task. Juana's children are what motivates her to work every day. Although one of them is far away studying, she tries to watch over his wellbeing. Now, Juana wants to improve the breed of her animals, and in order to do this she plans to buy quality sheep so that in time she can become a successful livestock farmer.

Translated from Spanish by PULP Translators, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sheep to improve the quality of her livestock

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teofila tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos de 18, 16, 13 y10 años, quienes le ayudan en su trabajo.
Desde muy pequeña estuvo relacionada con la crianza de animales, sus padres fueron unos grandes ganaderos de su localidad, desde que contrajo matrimonio Teofila vio en la ganadería su mejor opción de ganarse la vida, aproximadamente ya son 25 años que está plenamente  dedicada a sus animales, que son unas preciosas llamas, sale a pastear todas las mañanas por los campos de los alrededores de su comunidad, siendo esto lo que más le agrada de su trabajo, aunque lo más difícil es poder alimentarlas en tiempos de invierno, ya que el frío perjudica su normal actividad.
Teofila basa su esfuerzo en sus cuatro hijos, quienes son su mayor estímulo de seguir trabajando.
Con le dinero que solicita desea incrementar su ganado, adquirir un par de llamas adicionales para poder garantizar el bienestar de  su familia.
texts.en:
Teofila is 48 years of age, and she lives with her husband and 4 children, who are 18, 16, 13 and 10 years old and help her with her business.

Since she was very young, she was related to the breeding of animals. Her parents were great livestock breeders in their area; and since she got married, Teofila saw in livestock breeding her best of option for making a living. It has been approximately 25 years that she has been fully dedicated to her animals, which are beautiful llamas. She goes out to graze them every morning to the surrounding pastures in her community, which to her is the part of her work she most enjoys. The most difficult thing is to feed them during the winter, since the cold weather affects her normal routine.

With the loan she is requesting, she would like to increase the size of her livestock by acquiring a couple of additional llamas to guarantee the well-being of her family.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase two more llamas to increase the size of her livestock.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 39 años, vive con su esposa y sus 7 hijos, de los cuales el mayor tiene 18 y el último apenas un añito.
Alberto es ganadero, actividad a la cual se dedica hace 25 años y gracias ello puede solventar los gastos de su numerosa familia, por ello, todas las mañanas sale a pastear con sus animalitos para que puedan comer, los guía con mucho cuidado, ya que en un descuido puede perderlos, porque los zorros están siempre atentos a cualquier  descuido.Le agrada cuidar a sus animalitos, ya gracias a ellos puede llevar un plato de comida a sus hijos, aunque lo más difícil es matarlos para llevar su carne a los mercados de las ciudades cercanas.  
Alberto tiene en su numerosa familia, a sus mayores amores y motivadores de su vida.
El dinero que pide se invertirá en la compra de carneritos, los que le ayuden a mejorar su ganado y  lograra ser el mejor ganadero de su localidad.
texts.en:
Alberto is 39 years of age, and he lives with his wife and 7 children, of which the eldest is 18 years and the youngest is only one year old.

Alberto is a livestock breeder, and has been doing this for 25 years. Thanks to this activity, he can cover the expenses of his sizable family. For this reason, he goes out every morning to graze his little animals so they can eat. He guides them with much care, since he may lose them if he loses sight of them because the foxes are always on the lookout for anyone letting their guard down. He enjoys caring for his animals, being that thanks to this he can take a meal to his children, but the most difficult thing is killing them to take their meat to the markets of nearby cities.

Alberto’s big family is his greatest love, and they are the biggest motivators in his life. The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of young sheep, which will help to improve his livestock and help him become the best breeder in his area.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase young sheep to improve the breed and quality of his livestock.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julián tiene 27 años, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 10 y 5 años.
Es ganadero, tiene vaquitas a las que cría y pastea todas las mañanas, actividad que viene realizando desde hace 5 años y considera rentable.Esta actividad le toda la mañanas para llevarlos a los pastizales a que se alimenten, luego de haberlos cuidado durante varios meses, los lleva a vender, etapa que se hace complicada por motivos del transporte, al no tener un propio vehículo, debe amoldarse a los tiempos y precios que le ofrezcan.Esporádicamente también se dedica a la agricultura, pero no lo hace de lleno, porque considera que los tiempos han cambiado mucho para que sea una labor satisfactoria.
Julián tiene en sus dos hijos, sus motivos de seguir luchando como ganadero y agricultor. 
Ahora, desea invertir en la mejora de su ganado vacuno, los cuales son más rentables en los mercados.
texts.en:
Julian is 27 years of age, and he lives with his wife and two children, ages 10 and 5. He is a livestock breeder; he has little cows which he breeds and grazes every morning. He has been doing this for the past 5 years and considers it very profitable. He takes his livestock to the pastures every morning for nourishment. Then, after caring for them for several months, he takes them to be sold, but this phase is complicated due to transportation issues. Because he does not own his own vehicle, he must adjust to the schedules and prices that are offered to him. He also sporadically ventures into agriculture, but he does not do this full-time because he believes that times have changed considerably like for it to be a satisfactory occupation.

Julian’s two children are his reason for continuing his efforts as a livestock breeder and farmer. Today, he wishes to invest in the improvement of his beef cattle, which is more profitable in the markets.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in the improvement of the quality of his beef cattle.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: La señora Claudia R., tiene 33 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos su hija mayor tiene 16 años cursa el tercer años de secundaria, y su otra hija tiene 8 años de edad que esta en el segundo grado de primaria,. Su esposo trabaja como jefe de compras en un hotel de la ciudad, por lo que sus ingresoso no son lo suficiente como para poder mantener a su familia, sin embargo, con ayuda de los creditos, doña Claudia, ha podido ir creciendo poco a poco con su idea de tener una pulperia, donde ademas de ofertar productos para el hogar como arroz. azucar, aceite, frijoles papel higienico, detergentes, gaseso, tambien ofrece ropa variada con el fin de ofertar sus clientes una variedad de productos de necesidad para el hogar, el proposito es poder mejorar y hacer desarrollar su pequeño negocio, sus sueño es poder ver a sus hijos formados como profesionales del mañana, la señoar tiene tres años de dedicarse a este negocio, dando inicio como una opcion de empleo y apoyo al nucleo familiar, ya que su actividad economica con la cual se da a conocer en el mercado es a traves de la venta de ropa y cosmeticos de forma ambulante, pero con la iniciativa de crecer economicamente en la actualidad tiene esta pequeña pulperia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Claudia R. is 33 years old. She is married and has 2 children. Her older daughter is 16 years old and is in her third year of high school. Her younger daughter is 8 years old and is in her second year of elementary school. Her husband is a purchasing manager for a hotel in the city; his earnings are not sufficient to support his family. However, with the help of loans, Mrs. Claudia has been able to grow, little by little, her small grocery store, where in addition to offering products for the home, like rice, sugar, oil, beans, toilet paper, detergents, and soda, she also offers various clothes. Her goal is to offer her clients a variety of products that are necessary in the home. The purpose is to be able to improve and develop her small business. Her dream is to be able to see her children educated as tomorrow’s professionals. Claudia has dedicated three years to this business, which began as an option of employment and support to her family, because her economic activity, the traveling sale clothes and cosmetics, taught her a lot about the market. With the initiative of growing economically, at present, she has this small grocery store.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Capital for her work

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Fundación Leon 2000 - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: Macario

texts.es:
Macario tiene 43 años, vive con su esposa y sus 4 jóvenes hijos.
Desde hace un par de años notó la necesidad de establecer una tienda en su comunidad, ya que eran escasas y mucho más aquellas que brinden productos que satisfagan todas las necesidades de los pobladores, por tal motivo, empezó su dedicación a su negocio, trata en lo posible de ofrecer variedad de productos y buena atención, y cuando hay festividades en su pueblo, vende cerveza.Esta actividad le agrada mucho, porque le da tiempo para trabajar como agricultor en las mañanas, mientras su esposa atiende su tienda y por las tardes, él se hace cargo del negocio, para que su esposa vele por sus hijos. Lo dificultoso, es el transporte de la mercadería desde la ciudad hasta su comunidad. 
Macario tiene su motor de vida en sus cuatro hijos, por quienes se esfuerza en ser mejor.
Para poder incrementar y ambientar su tienda, para que pueda atender a sus clientes adecuadamente y ofreciéndole un ambiente tranquilo, es que solicita este préstamo.
texts.en:
Macario is 43 years of age and lives with his wife and four young children. Several years ago, he noticed the need to establish a general store in his community, being that they were scarce; especially those that offer products that satisfy all the necessities of the residents. For this reason, he began his dedication toward his business. He tries as best as possible to offer variety in his products and good customer service, and when there are festivities in his town, he sells beer. He really enjoys this activity because it allows him to work as a farmer in the mornings while his wife works in the store. In the afternoons, he takes over so that his wife can look after their children. The most difficult thing is the transportation of his merchandise from the city to his community. Macario’s reason for living are his four children, for whom he tries to become a better person. He is requesting this loan to expand and stock his store so that he can tend to his clients adequately, offering them a comfortable environment.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the variety of the products he offers and arrange his store in a pleasant and comfortable manner for his clients.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
Aurea es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Aurea es casada, tiene 44 años y 7 hijos, Aurea vive en la comunidad de Huascahura que se ubica a 30 minutos de la ciudad de Ayacucho, Aurea viaja a las ferias de Ceccelambras los días jueves, a Alpachaca los días domingo, en donde vende hoja de coca, que es consumido por los campesinos que tienen por costumbre ancestral masticar la hoja, para energizarse en los diferentes trabajos que realizan, la hoja de coca lo compra de la empresa nacional de coca y de las ferias compra queso, cereales, animales, luego lo transporta a la ciudad de Ayacucho en donde los animales los beneficia en su casa y lo vende de casa en casa, mientras que los cereales y los quesos lo vende a los comerciantes de los mercados.

Aurea necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de quesos, trigo, cebada, quinua. Los sueños de Aurea son mejorar su casa, brindar una buena educación y alimentación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aurea is a member of the Arco Iris Communal Bank.

She is married, is 44 years of age and has 7 children. Aurea lives in the Huascahura community, situated 30 minutes from the city of Ayacucho. Aurea travels to the fairs in Ceccelambras on Thursdays, and to Alpachaca on Sundays where she sells coca leaves, which are consumed by the farmers who by ancestral custom, chew it to energize themselves for the different tasks they carry out. She purchases the coca leaves from the national coca manufacturer, and at the fairs she purchases cheese, cereals, and animals. She then transports these products to the city of Ayacucho, where she butchers the animals in her home then sells them door-to-door, and she sells the cereals and cheese to the merchants in the markets.

Aurea needs a loan of 1600 soles, which will be invested in the purchase of cheese, wheat, barley and quinoa. Aureas dream is to make improvements to her home and to offer her children proper nourishment and a good education.

Translated from Spanish by Evelyn Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Aurea needs a loan of 1600 soles, which will be invested in the purchase of cheese, wheat, barley and quinoa.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo y sus  dos hijos  de 16 y 7 años, quienes le ayudan  en su negocio al terminar sus estudios.
Está dedicada a su ferretería, en la cual le va muy bien, gracias a Dios, y sobre todo, no tiene que descuidar a su familia, puesto que su negocio está en su domicilio.La venta de su ferretería es muy buena, ya que es la única que hay en el lugar, para tener la misma concurrencia y no perder clientes, atiende adecuadamente y con mucha alegría, lo más  difícil es adquirir las herramientas que buscan sus vecinos y a veces no puede adquirirlas por su alto precio.
Nancy tiene en su familia su mayor motivador, para salir adelante y crecer en su negocio. 
El préstamo que solicita es para invertir en la compra de mercadería, sobre todo de las herramientas que llenen las expectativas y las demandas de sus vecinos y clientes.
texts.en:
Nancy is 44 years old and lives with her husband and their two children who are 16 and 7 years of age and who help with the business once they've finished school.

Nancy is dedicated to her hardware store, which is going well, thanks to God, and above everything, she does not have to neglect her family since her business is located in her home. Hardware sales are very good since their store is the only one in the area. In order to have the same audience and to not lose customers, she serves well and with much happiness. What is most difficult is to acquire the tools that her neighbors seek and sometimes she cannot buy them due to their high price. Nancy's greatest motivator to get ahead and grow her business is her family .

The loan that she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of merchandise, especially the tools that fulfill the expectations and demands of her neighbors and customers.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the merchandise of her hardware store, especially to purchase certain tools that are difficult to acquire due to their high price.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
Haydee es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Haydee es conviviente, tiene 35 años y 2 hijos, Haydee vende ropa de segunda en la feria del distrito de San Juan Bautista que se realiza solo los días domingos, y también cada 15 días viaja al distrito de Tambo, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de su hermana, sus productos los adquiere en la ciudad de Lima. Además Haydee junto a su esposo tiene 2 mototaxis con el cual trabaja su esposo y su hijo, y en algunas oportunidades lo alquila.

Haydee necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de ropa usada. Haydee sueña con comprar su casa, un carro para realizar transporte y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Haydee is a member of the Rainbow Communal Bank.

Haydee is married, 35 years old and has two children. Haydee sells second-hand clothes in the market in in the San Juan Bautista district. The market is only open on Sundays. She also travels to the Tambo district every 15 days, which she does with her sister. They buy their products in the city of Lima. Additionally, Haydee, along with her husband, has two mototaxis that she works with her husband and son. Sometimes they also rent them to others.

Haydee needs a loan of 2000 soles, which she will invest in buying used clothes. Haydee dreams of buying a house and a car to transport her goods and she dreams that her children become professionals.


Translated from Spanish by Lauren Conover, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy used clothing

loans.name: Sergio Jose

texts.es: El señor Sergio Jose O., tiene 34 años de edad, es casado le tienen tres hijos, una niña de 12 años de edad que cursa el tercer grado de primaria en una ecuela publica, y sus otros dos hijos son gemelos y tienen 8 años de edad y ambos cursan el segundo grado de primaria, su esposa tambien le ayuda en la barberia cuando puede sino se mantiene cuidando a sus hijos, su proposito es poder acondicionar un local donde mejorar y ofertar sus servicios como barbero, el cual en la actualidad esta ubicado en el mercado la terminal de buses en leon, donde tiene bastante demanda, este señor tiene dos años de tener esta barberia propia, habiendo iniciado como ayudante en otro salon pero como iniciativa y con el deseo de superarse se dio a la tarea de poner su propia barberia y generar empleo, su deseo es poder acondicionar mejor su local y aperturar otro salon y ofertar sus servicios.
texts.en:
Mr. Sergio Jose O. is 34 years old, he is married and has 3 children, a girl who is 12 years old and in 3rd grade in a public school, and the other two sons are 8 years old and twins, both are in 2nd grade. His wife also helps him at the barber shop if she is not taking care of the children. The reason for the loan he is requesting is to improve his barber shop to offer better services, which is currently located in the market at the bus terminal in Leon. He has good demand for his services there, he has two years with his own barber shop, he started as an assistant at another saloon but with good initiative and his will for improvement he opened his own barber shop and generated employment, his wish is to improve his shop and open another saloon and offer his services.

Translated from Spanish by Nina Delgado, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther tiene 34 años, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos jóvenes. 
Tiene una pequeña bodega dentro de su domicilio, que hace un año está al servicio de todos los pobladores de su comunidad, los que se sienten muy agradecidos por la atención y servicio que les brinda doña Esther.Lo que sin duda le agrada es que puede estar al pendiente de su hogar y su negocio a la vez, pero las cosas se están tornando difíciles, por el incremento de los precios de los productos, lo que la limita en la adquisición de su mercadería.
Esther tiene sin duda, el apoyo de sus hijos jóvenes, quienes a la ves son su mayor  motivo de  trabajo.
Ahora ella desea adquirir mayor cantidad de productos en las ciudades y trasladarlos a  su bodeguita y tener así, la posibilidad de seguir creciendo como negociante y consolidar su negocio dentro de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Esther is 34 years old and lives with her husband and their four young children.

She owns a small shop located in her house, which, for a year, has been at the service of the whole population of her community who feel thankful for the attention and service that Esther provides. What pleases her, without a doubt, is the ability to stay at home and work at the same time. However, things are becoming difficult because of the increase in prices of products which limits her in terms of acquiring merchandise. Esther has, without a doubt, the support of her young children who, at the same time, are her motivation to work. Now, she wishes to acquire a greater quantity of products in the cities and bring them to her little shop and to have the possibility to continue to grow as a business owner and consolidate her business in her community.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the merchandise of her convenience store.

loans.name: Emiliana Adela

texts.es:
Emiliana es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Emiliana es conviviente, tiene 43 años y 4 hijos, Emiliana tiene un pequeño taller de corte y confección de prendas en su casa, actividad que realiza sola, Emiliana confecciona ropa típica de la zona como blusas, fustanes, mandiles, los cuales son vendidos en los diferentes pueblos del distrito de Socos a donde viaja los días sábados, vende al crédito. Además Emiliana trabaja por las tardes como personal de servicio en una institución estatal y por las noches se dedica a la confección de las prendas.

Emiliana necesita un préstamo de 2800 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de telas variadas. Los sueños de Emiliana son construir su casa, mejorar más su negocio y que sus hijos estudien para ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Emiliana is a member of the Arco Iris Communal Bank.

Emiliana lives with her partner, is 43 years old and has four children. Emiliana has a small seamstress shop in her home, an activity that she does alone. Emiliana produces typical clothing for her area such as blouses, slips and aprons, which are sold in different towns in the Socos district where she travels on Saturdays and sells on credit. In addition, Emiliana works in the afternoons as a service person at a state institution and, at night, dedicates herself to making garments.

Emiliana needs a loan of 2,800 soles which she will invest in the purchase of various fabrics. Emiliana's dreams are to build a house, improve her business more, and that her children study to become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Emiliana needs a loan of 2,800 soles which she will invest in the purchase of various fabrics.

loans.name: Frida

texts.es:
Frida tiene 33 años, vive con sus 3 hijos menores de edad. Tiene su pequeña bodega, que con mucho esfuerzo logró obtener hace 6 meses, desde entonces se dedica a ello a tiempo completo, gracias a que la instaló en su propio domicilio le ayuda a estar pendiente de su negocio y de su hogar, ya que se separó de su pareja y tiene que asumir doble rol de madre y padre para sus hijos.Sin duda, este negocio le ha ayudado mucho en su economía, pero lo que en verdad le agrada es poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus vecinos, ya que hay pocas tiendas en su comunidad, lo que es muy beneficioso para ella. Lo difícil es que tiene que trasladarse a las ciudades cada semana, para surtir su bodega.
Para Frida su motivo de progreso son sus tres pequeños hijos, quienes requieren de ella para salir adelante.
Desea incrementar sus productos y mejorar el ambiente de su bodega, para brindar una mejor  atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Frida is 33 years old and lives with her three young children. She owns a small shop that she obtained after much effort six months ago. Since then, she has dedicated all of her time to this business. Thanks to establishing it in her own home, she is able to attend to both her business and her home, since she separated from her husband and has to assume the double role of mother and father to her children. Without a doubt, this business has helped her a lot with her finances. However, what truly makes her happy is to satisfy the needs of her neighbors, since there are few shops in her community, so it is very beneficial. What is difficult is having to travel to the city every week in order to stock her shop.

For Frida, her motivation is her three small children, who need her to get ahead. She wishes to increase her products and improve the environment of her shop in order to provide better care to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her merchandise and improve her shop's environment.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Guadalupe es casada, tiene 37 años y 7 hijos, Guadalupe vive en la comunidad de Rancha que se ubica a 30 minutos de la ciudad de Ayacucho, viaja a dos ferias de la región que son las ferias de Putaja y Alpachaca a donde lleva maíz que compra del mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Ayacucho y también frutas, de las ferias compra queso, animales menores que beneficia en su casa y vende de casa en casa, sus ventas algunas veces son al crédito. Además Guadalupe se dedica al engorde de animales que también vende.

Guadalupe necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cereales, ganado ovino. Los sueños de Guadalupe son que sus hijos estudien para ser profesionales y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is a member of the Arco Iris Community Bank.

Guadalupe is married, is 37 years old and has seven children. Guadalupe lives in the Rancha community, which is located 30 minutes from the city of Ayacucho. She travels to two fairs in the region, the Putaja and Alpachaca fairs, to which she brings maize which she buys from the Ayacucho market, as well as fruit. At the fairs, she buys cheese and young animals that will thrive in her home and that she sells from house to house. Sometimes, her sales are on credit. In addition, Guadalupe fattens animals that she also sells.

Guadalupe needs a loan of 1,600 soles that will be invested in the purchase of cereals and sheep. Guadalupe's dreams are that her children study to become professionals and to improve her business.


Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Guadalupe needs a loan of 1,600 soles that will be invested in the purchase of cereals and sheep.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos escolares. Desde muy pequeña se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo de frutas, pero por esta temporada está dedicada a las plantaciones de yuca, su labor en sus chacras le toma casi todo el día.Sin embargo le agrada poder dedicarse algo que desde niña le gustó mucho, sobre todo el tiempo de cosecha y de comercialización, son etapas que a todo agricultor le agrada, aunque  que para poder llegar a ello se haya tenido que sobrellevar los cambios de clima, la limpieza diaria de los terrenos, las malas yerbas, etc.
Los cinco hijos de Adela, son su razón de vivir y de trabajar.  hora ella está dispuesta a seguir invirtiendo en la producción de yucas y ampliar sus chacras  para sembrar otros productos, y así, incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Adela is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and her 5 school-aged children. Since she was small she has worked in agriculture and cultivating fruits. This season she is working on the yuca plantations. The work on the farm takes her almost the whole day. However, she would like to work on something that she has liked since she was a child, which is harvesting and commercialization. They are stages that all farmers like, but in order to reach those stages she has had to face the climate changes, the daily cleaning of the land, the bad grass, etc.

Adela's 5 children are her reason for living and for working. Now she is able to continue investing in the production of yuca and increasing the size of her small farm to grow other products and, by doing so, increase her income.


Translated from Spanish by Lauren Conover, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in the production of yuca and increase her agricultural lands

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Julia es separada, tiene 45 años y 6 hijos, Julia vive en una casa alquilada y es quien mantiene su hogar, Julia viaja a las ferias de la región, los días sábados a Ccejelambras y domingos a Huamanguilla, en donde vende la Hoja de coca que es consumido por los campesinos que tienen por costumbre ancestral masticar la hoja, para energizarse en los diferentes trabajos que realizan, y de las ferias compra cereales, animales, quesos que vende a los comerciantes de los mercados de la ciudad de Ayacucho.

Julia necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que fue invertido en la compra de trigo, cebada, maíz. Los sueños de Julia son tener casa propia, ampliar su negocio y que sus hijos culminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the Rainbow Communal Bank.

Julia is separated. She is 45 years old and has 6 children. Julia lives in a rented house and is in charge of her home. Julia travels to the markets in the region: on Saturdays to Ccejelambras and on Sundays to Huamanguilla, where they sell the coca leaf that is consumed by the peasants that have an ancestral custom of chewing the leaf to increase their energy for the different work they do. In the markets she buys grains, animals and cheeses that the business people sell in the markets of the city of Ayacucho.

Julia needs a loan of 1000 soles which she will invest in the purchase of wheat, barley and corn. Julia's dreams are to have her own home, increase her business and that her children finish their studies.


Translated from Spanish by Lauren Conover, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase wheat, barley and corn.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Antonia es casada, tiene 48 años y 5 hijos, Antonia tiene un puesto en el mercado Playa Grau, un mercado céntrico de la ciudad de Ayacucho, Antonia vende cereales variados, enteros, molidos, sus productos lo compra del mercado de abastos, sus ventas lo realiza de lunes a jueves durante todo el día, y los días viernes y domingos viaja a la feria de Vinchos en donde compra cereales, quesos, animales que beneficia en su casa y luego lo vende a sus vecinas, para lo cual cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijas.

Antonia necesita un préstamo de 1800 soles, dinero que será invertido en la compra de maíz, trigo, arveja, haba. Los sueños de Antonia son tener una tienda en su casa, mejorar su negocio y comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Antonia is a member of the Rainbow Communal Bank.

Antonia is married. She is 48 years old and has 5 children. Antonia has a spot in the Playa Grau market, a central market in the city of Ayacucho. Antonia sells a variety of whole, ground grains. Her products are purchased in the market and her sales are done Monday to Thursday throughout the whole day. Fridays and Sundays she travels to the market in Vinchos where she buys grains, cheeses, and animals that benefit her house and later she sells them to her neighbors, with which her children help.

Antonia needs a loan of 1800 soles, which she will invest in the purchase of corn, wheat, peas and beans. Antonia's dreams are to have a store in her house, to improve her business and to buy a car.


Translated from Spanish by Lauren Conover, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase corn, wheat, peas and beans

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana es socia del Banco Comunal Arco Iris.

Juliana es conviviente, tiene 41 años y 3 hijos, Juliana junto a su esposo tienen un carro con el cual realizan transporte a la selva ayacuchana, su esposo es quien conduce el carro y viaja 3 veces por semana. Juliana antes vendía ropa en la selva ayacuchana, pero dejo de realizar porque tenia que cuidar a sus hijos. Además Juliana tiene una vulcanizadora en una avenida para lo cual cuenta con la ayuda de personales, Juliana solo visita su negocio para supervisar la atención de su negocio.

Juliana necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles, dinero que será invertido en el mantenimiento mecánico de su carro. Juliana sueña con construir otra casa, tener una tienda, un restaurante y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Juliana is a member of the “Arco Iris” communal bank. Juliana lives with her husband, is 41 years old, and has 3 children. Juliana and her husband have a car, which they use for transport to the jungle in the area around Ayacucho. Her husband drives the car and makes the trip 3 times per week. Juliana used to sell clothing in the Ayacuchan jungle, but she quit doing this because she had to take care of her children. Additionally, Juliana owns a tire repair shop and has the help of employees. Juliana just goes to her business to supervise. Juliana needs a loan of 1000.00 soles, which will be invested in maintenance for her car. Juliana dreams of building a new house, having a store, a restaurant, and that her children will be professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Juliana needs a loan of 1000.00 soles, which will be invested in maintenance for her car.

loans.name: Bei

texts.en:
Bei R., 47, is married and lives in Kampong Cham, Cambodia. Since 1979, she has operated a business buying bananas from farms and selling them to earn a profit of approximately US$ 3.30 per day. Her husband, Sok Seang Hun, is a worker who transports fruit from the farm to the market and is able to make US$ 4 in profit each day as well to support the family.

This couple together has two young children. Mrs. Bei is asking for a loan from Kiva via Credit MFI, Kiva's local partner, of US$ 400 to purchase a horse and cart for her husband to use to transport fruit from farm to market. The couple said that they want all their children to get a good education in order to get a good job in the future. They don't want them to be farmers as it takes a lot of labor and energy but makes less to support the family.

loans.use: To purchase a horse and cart to transport fruit from farm to market

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CREDIT, a partner of World Relief - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Purnomo

texts.id: Purnomo menekuni usahanya menjual makanan berupa bakso. Tinggal di daerah pesisir pantai yang kebetulan dekat dengan dermaga penyeberangan membuat Purnomo bertekad untuk lebih memajukan usahanya. Kesehariaannya dihabiskan untuk menjual bakso di daerah dermaga dekat rumahnya yang mana pelanggannya adalah orang-orang yang menyeberang lewat dermaga tersebut. Dengan modal awal sebesar Rp. 500.000,- Purnomo bisa meraup keuntungan sekitar Rp. 60.000,- setiap hari dengan berjualan bakso dari jam 3 sore sampai jam 10 malam. Bersama istrinya yang selalu membantunya dalam menyiapkan & memasak makanan yang akan dijual, Purnomo memutuskan untuk meminjam ke DINARI melalui program KIVA sebesar Rp.3000.000,- yang akan digunakannya untuk menambah modal usahanya menjual bakso. Purnomo berharap dengan penambahan modal ini akan meningkatkan omset penjualannya sehingga keuntungan yang diperoleh pun akan bertambah besar. Hasil dari menjual bakso ini sangat mendukung ekonomi keluarganya dan juga bisa memenuhi kebutuhan sekolah anaknya yang duduk di bangku SD.
texts.en:
Purnomo is in the business of selling meatball. He lives nearby a very busy inter-island port and this makes him believes that he can further improve his business. His initial capital is IDR 500 thousand (around USD 55) and he can earn a profit of IDR 60 thousand (around USD 6.5) per day. He sells his meatball from 3 pm to 10 pm everyday. Purnomo decided to apply for a IDR 3 million loan (around USD 325) from DINARI foundation to further add his working capital. He hopes he can increase his revenue and therefore he will be able to improve his family welfare. This will enable him to secure the funding to send his children to elementary school.

Translated from Indonesian by Antonius Gunadi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to add working capital (Menambah modal usaha)

loans.name: Chum

texts.en: Chum S., 41, sells grocery products out of her home in Kampong Chhnang where she lives with her husband, Luk Chhoun, and their young child. Her husband helps her operate her grocery store and together they usually make $20 per day in revenue. They have asked for a loan of $500 to purchase more grocery products to fill their store and meet growing customer demands. They have been seeking to increase their income and they see expanding their store and diversifying their customers' options as the best way to help their family. There are a lot of competitors in the grocery store business, but the family believes that this loan will help their business and improve their situation in the long run.

loans.use: Increase grocery inventory

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CREDIT, a partner of World Relief - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Chim

texts.en: Chim S., 37, sells fish at the local food market with her husband, Chhorn Soa Yorn, in Kampong Chhnang. She and her husband make a net income of $5 per day to support their young child in school as well as Chim S.'s elderly mother. Chim S. has asked for a loan of $1200 to purchase a motorbike for her family's business. They need to transport the fish to the market each day and the current public transportation costs are very high because of rising gas prices. Any leftover money that the family has will be used in to invest in the fish business, to increase inventory and profits. In the future, Chim S. hopes to open a grocery store in the market. However, for now, she will focus on expanding her current business.

loans.use: Purchase a motorbike for business transportation needs

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CREDIT, a partner of World Relief - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Hem

texts.en: Hem Y., 41, sells dried fish at the local food market and typically makes $5 per day in net income. Her husband, Chim Doeun, is a fisherman who catches shrimp and other fish, making $6 per day. They live in Kampong Chhnang province with their six children and two of their children help their parents with the fishing business. It is a large family to support and the education needs of the four children are costly. Hem Y. has asked for a loan of $1000 to help her husband improve his fishing business through the purchase of a new, faster boat. Her husband frequently has to travel a long distance to reach the fishing area where he can catch the shrimp. This purchase can really help his business out and the family hopes that it can improve their standard of living and increase their income. Hem Y. was unavailable for a photograph at the time of the interview, so her husband, Chim Doeun, and his boat are pictured above.

loans.use: Purchase a new fishing boat

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CREDIT, a partner of World Relief - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Zeba Rashid

texts.en:
Zeba Rashid baji is the wife of N. A. and lives in an area of Lahore named Ismail Nagar, Pakistan. She has been living in this area for the last 22 years. She is the mother of five children: two boys and three girls. Her elder son is in the 5th standard (grade). The next to him is in 2nd standard. Her elder daughter is in 3rd standard. The next two of hers are in kindergarten. 

Zeban baji's husband is a butcher by profession. He has been in this profession for the last 16 years. Zeba baji completed her education at the 8th standard and then got married. She has been married for the last 16 years. Zeba baji is a housewife but she sells jewelry also. She specifically sells bridal jewelry. Zeba baji successfully completed her 3 years from Asasah (a microfinance institute of Pakistan). Now she is applying for a loan to buy cattle (goats) for her husband's meat business.

loans.use: To buy livestock for the butcher shop

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz baji is the wife of M. H. and lives in an area of city Lahore named Ismail Nagar, Pakistan. She has been living in this area for the last 10 years. She is the mother of three kids: two daughters and one son. Her elder daughter is married. The next completed her education at the 8th standard and now does household work. Her son is in kindergarten. 

Her husband has a shop where he sells construction supplies (cement and small stones). Her husband has been in this profession for the last 25 years. Shahnaz baji is a housewife and prefers to do household work. She successfully repaid her four loans from Asasah (a microfinance institute of Pakistan). Now she is applying for a loan to buy construction supplies (cement, hailstones) for her husband's shop.

loans.use: To buy construction supplies

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en: Sajida baji is the wife of A. H. and lives in an area of city Lahore named Ismail Nagar, Pakistan. She has been living in this area for the last 11 years. She is the mother of four children: two boys and two girls. Her one daughter and one son are in kindergarten. Her husband is a butcher by profession. He runs a meat shop, with experience of 11 years. Sajida baji is a housewife and prefers to do household work. Sajida baji and her husband want to give their children a better future. Sajida baji successfully repaid her first loan from Asasah (a microfinance institute of Pakistan). Now she is applying for a loan to buy livestock (goats, cows) for her husband's meat business.

loans.use: To buy cattle for the meat business

loans.name: Neang
